did.unittitle: Catherine Bishir Collection of Architectural Drawings, Photographs, and Other Materials
did.abstract: The collection is comprised of a floorplan (drawing), specifications, pamphlet, and photograph for a round house designed by the Rondesics Leisure Home Corporation.

Catherine Bishir's career has focused on documenting the history of North Carolina architecture. She was the senior architectural historian and architectural survey coordinator for the State Historic Preservation Office in the North Carolina Department of Cultural Resources. She has served as senior architectural historian for Preservation North Carolina and adjunct professor for NC State's School of Architecture. She is also first curator of architecture special collections for the NCSU Libraries.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Catherine Bishir's career has focused on documenting the history of North Carolina architecture. She was the senior architectural historian and architectural survey coordinator for the State Historic Preservation Office in the North Carolina Department of Cultural Resources. She has published seminal books documenting the history of North Carolina architecture including North Carolina Architecture (1990, 2005). She co-authored the following: A Guide to the Historic Architecture of Piedmont North Carolina (2003), A Guide to the Historic Architecture of Eastern North Carolina (1996), A Guide to the Historic Architecture of Western North Carolina (1999), Architects and Builders in North Carolina : A History of the Practice of Building (1990). She has also published dozens of articles, presented numerous invited lectures and papers, and received funding from the North Caroliniana Society and the National Endowment for the Humanities. She has served as senior architectural historian for Preservation North Carolina and adjunct professor for NC State's School of Architecture. She is also first curator of architecture special collections for the NCSU Libraries. She has been editor in chief of the NCSU Libraries online tool NC Architects and Builders.
